item.description:
The XTERRA Muddy Moose Xduro Trail Races take place in Wolfeboro NH, with the option of running either 4 or 14 miles through rolling muddy hills. You can sign up at http://www.ferguscull... . It's part of both the XTERRA New England Trail Series and the WMAC Grand Tree Trail Race Series.

They have water stops at miles 2, 5, 6, and 9, with refreshments and anti-mud hoses available after the run. There are awards for overall and age group winners, and T shirts for at least the first 100 entrants.

If you want to get rid of surplus unworn race T-shirts, the race director is collecting them to donate to Haitian children.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Muddy Moose Xduro Trail Races - 4 or 14 Miler
